courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and rhythm.

instructor.name: John Doe
instructor.bio: John is a professional musician with over 20 years of experience in teaching music theory.

reviews.comment: Great course! Very informative and easy to follow.
Good introduction to music theory. I learned a lot.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your piano skills with advanced techniques and exercises.

instructor.name: Jane Smith
instructor.bio: Jane is a concert pianist with a passion for teaching advanced piano techniques.

reviews.comment: Challenging but very rewarding. Jane is an excellent instructor.
Helped me improve my skills significantly. Highly recommend.

courses.title: Guitar for Beginners
courses.description: Start your guitar journey with this comprehensive beginner course.

instructor.name: Mike Brown
instructor.bio: Mike is a professional guitarist and music teacher with over 15 years of experience.

reviews.comment: Perfect for beginners! Mike explains everything very clearly.
A good starting point for learning the guitar. Enjoyed the course.
